item.title: Google Artifact Registry
item.description: Originally, the Docker image hosting was done on DockerHub, which offers hosting of ONE private Docker image. Our project requires at least two, so we had to find other solutions. Google Cloud Platform And it is in our research that we discovered Google Cloud Platform, also called “GCP”. This set of cloud tools signed by Google offers a Docker container hosting service called Google Artifact Registry, and offers a trial offer including $300 for 90 days.
